channel.title: Otolaryngology in Leeds
channel.description: Recent content on Otolaryngology in Leeds

item.title: About Us
item.description: We are Leeds based Consultant ENT Surgeons, practicing at Spire Leeds Hospital, Nuffield Hospital Leeds and Leeds Teaching Hospitals NHS Trust. We offer a full range of adult and paediatric Otorhinolaryngology services to the good people of Leeds and further afield. Having undertaken higher surgical fellowships in Head & Neck Surgical Oncology and Thyroid surgery (JM) and Otology, Neurotology and Hearing Implants (TW) we provide subspecialist care in these areas. We undertake private healthcare for patients insured with all major private healthcare providers as well as self pay patients.

item.title: At your consultation
item.description: At your consultation you will have the opportunity to discuss the problem you have with the Consultant and undergo relevant clinical examination. As part of the assessment and/or treatment addition procedures may be necessary and might incur an additional charge, as outlined below Condition Procedure Procedure Code Nose & Throat Fibreoptic nasendoscopy E2500/E2501 Ears Microsuction D0702 Ears Removal foreign body D0730 Nose Cautery E0380 Hearing Audiogram 20220 Hearing Tympanography 20230 Balance Epley’s mnvre AA577

item.title: Conditions Treated
item.description: Both JM and TW provide general Ear, Nose and Throat services for both paediatric and adult patients including; Tonsillitis, tonsillectomy and adenoidectomy Hearing loss affecting children and adults Glue ear and grommets Tongue tie (frenulotomy) Blocked noses and septoplasty Rhinitis , sinusitis and nasal polyps Hoarseness, throat symptoms and swallowing problems Snoring Blocked ears & ear wax Bell’s plasy New patient appointments are 30 minutes, follow up appointments are 15 minutes

item.title: Our Specialist Areas
The Spire and Nuffield Hospitals
item.description: We offer out patient consultations and surgical procedures at Spire Leeds Hospital Jackson Avenue, Roundhay, Leeds LS8 1NT (view map) To book an appointment at the spire for Mr Moor follow this link To book an appointment at the spire for Mr Wilson follow this link Mr Moor also offers out patient appointments and surgery at Nuffield Leeds Hospital (view video) 3 Leighton Street, Leeds LS1 3EB (view map)
